title.rendered: STEDI 48 WATT SQUARE LED CAMP LIGHT

content.rendered:
48 Watt LED Work Light is compact, robust and powerful, making it an ideal camping light, or work light for 4×4, harvester or boat.

2,250 LUMENS EXCELLENT VALUE

MULTI-VOLT/P>

OVERVIEW

Coming Soon.

PERFORMANCE

Coming Soon.

BEAM CHARACTERISTICS

Coming Soon.

DETAILS

Don’t be fooled by its form factor, these LED work lights punch way above their weight group. 4000 Lumen with only 48 Watts is a testament to quality Bridgelux LEDs in these units.

Included in the package is;

  • 1 x Square 48 WATT LED Work Light
  • Stainless Steel Bolt, Washer and U Bracket.
  • Waterproof Deutsch Connectors
  • Polyester UV Rated Powder Coating (Suitable for Marine)

These units are dustproof, vibration proof and water proof, giving them a genuine IP67 rating.

SPECIFICATIONS

LED POWER 48 Watts
OPERATING VOLTAGE DC 9-32v
LED CHIPS 3w x 16 Bridgelux LEDs
COLOUR TEMPERATURE 6000K
LIGHT OUTPUT 4000lm
BEAM 65 Degree Flood
WATERPROOF IP67
DUSTPROOF & ANTI-VIBRATION YES
LENS Unbreakable PC
MOUNTING BRACKET STAINLESS STEEL
HOUSING MATERIAL DIE CAST ALLOY
LIFE SPAN 30000+ HOURS
DIMENSIONS(H X W X D) 105mm x 105mm x 50mm
WEIGHT 1kg
OPERATING TEMP  -40~50°C
COMPATIBLITY  12 Volt and 24 Volt

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x Square 48w LED WORK LIGHTS
  • All required mounting hardware
  • Male & Female Deutsch Connectors

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI 48 WATT SQUARE LED CAMP LIGHT

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
